body.p: Procedure for creating a new Project.

ol.li:
Log into the Helion CICD tool and begin.
If there are no projects, click New Project.
If some projects have already been created, click Projects at the top of the page and then click New Project.

Click to select your Git source.
Use GitHub: Connect to a repository hosted on GitHub .
Use Git: Connect to a repository hosted locally.
Click a repository in the list to select it.

Provide values:
Branch: Select the branch containing the code to build.
Environment: Select the target environment to deploy to. If the target environment has not yet been created, click Create New Environment.
Project Type: Select the appropriate development language.
Project Name: Enter a name for this project.
